Class MapItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • structs.MapItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Apple, Camera, Grape, Pear, PineappleEasterEgg, Squash, Wall

    public abstract class MapItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Carries metadata for all associated instances.
